text: Edward Francis Blewitt (January 2, 1859 May 26, 1926) was an American civil engineer, businessman, and politician. He was a Democratic member of the Pennsylvania State Senate for the 22nd district from 1907 to 1910. He was a maternal great-grandfather of Joe Biden, the President of the United States. ==References== Category:1859 births Category:1926 deaths Category:Engineers from Pennsylvania Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Scientists from Louisiana Category:Businesspeople from New Orleans Category:Politicians from New Orleans Category:Scientists from Pennsylvania Category:Businesspeople from Pennsylvania Category:Politicians from Scranton, Pennsylvania Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Joe Biden
title: Edward Francis Blewitt
